name: Talkspace, Inc.
description: Talkspace, Inc. is a leading online therapy platform that connects individuals with licensed therapists through a range of digital communication tools. Established in 2012, Talkspace aims to make mental health support more accessible and affordable for everyone. The platform provides a unique service where users can communicate with their therapists via text, audio, and video messaging, allowing for flexible and convenient therapy sessions that fit their schedules. Talkspace's mission is to reduce the stigma surrounding mental health and provide a safe space for individuals to seek help. The company also offers specialized services for couples and teens, catering to diverse mental health needs. With a user-friendly interface and a variety of subscription plans, Talkspace has empowered millions to take charge of their mental health journey. The company has been recognized for its innovative approach to therapy, leveraging technology to enhance the therapeutic experience and reach those who may not have access to traditional in-person therapy.

seo.meta_title: Talkspace, Inc. | Online Therapy and Mental Health Support
seo.meta_description: Explore Talkspace, Inc., a leader in online therapy. Discover how Talkspace connects individuals with licensed therapists through convenient digital communication.

faq.question: What services does Talkspace offer?
faq.answer: Talkspace offers online therapy services including individual therapy, couples therapy, and teen therapy.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Talkspace?
faq.answer: Oren Frank is the CEO of Talkspace, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Talkspace headquartered?
faq.answer: Talkspace is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: How does Talkspace work?
faq.answer: Talkspace connects users with licensed therapists via text, audio, and video messaging.
